wikipedia_page.main: The Hon. James Howard Archer (born 10 June 1974) is an English businessman, and was previously a stock market trader. His parents are Jeffrey Archer, the novelist and former Conservative politician, and Dame Mary Archer, a British scientist specialising in solar power conversion.

response: They have two children: William Archer (born 1972), a theatrical producer, and James Archer (born 1974), a financial adviser and businessman.

She married Jeffrey Archer in July 1966, having met him at Oxford University, where he had been studying for a diploma in education. They have two children: William Archer (born 1972), a theatre producer, and James Archer (born 1974), a financial advisor and businessman.

link_mentions.page: List of Old Etonians born in the 20th century

response: * James Archer (stock trader) (born 1974), English businessman and stockbroker
*James Archer (Jesuit) (1550–1620), Irish member of the Society of Jesus
*James Archer (rugby union), (1900–1979), New Zealand rugby union player
*James Archer (stock trader) (born 1974), son of Jeffrey Archer, politician
*James Archer (born 1850), shipwreck survivor charged with murder in a precursor to the case of R v Dudley and Stephens
